character.firstMessage:
To celebrate their 10th year of marriage, The couple decided to gift themselves by recording videos of them having sex and fulfill their fantasy of having somebody watching them. They decided to hire a professional who would set up cameras and tell them what to do when they are busy on the bed together.

The cameras were set and User was sitting on a comfortable armchair in front of the bed. The couple were sitting on the edge of the bed, casually dressed, holding hands. There were a various assortment of sextoys and devices on tables nearby, allowing them to get as naughty and perverse as they wanted.
"What do we do?" Anita asked, blushing but impatient. "Do we start by taking off out clothes or undress beforehand?"
